item.title: modals for settings in shiny
item.description: For some time I have been wondering about the best way to hide more advanced settings from the regular user of your app. I have some apps with many different filters and options, all of which I want to keep because they have their legitimate usage. However, they take up valuable space and also confuse the user who does not need advanced options at the moment. I also learned about the possibility of using modals and wondered whether there is a use case waiting to be solved.
